During my bachelor, I got hard on maths. I hadn’t done maths for ages and it was really difficult, but after a first year of struggling with the basics, I got the hang of it! I also discovered a whole new world: the human brain. I was introduced to psychology, cognitive science and neuroscience, and I found it fascinating! This degree was also focused on computer science, with a bit of AI too. I became a boss with Python. It was also during the summer of my second year that one of my computer science teachers offered me a placement at INRIA Bordeaux. I was going to get to know the inside of a research laboratory…
